snippet: A newly declassified document says that Soviet military leaders may have thought that the Able Archer training exercise was a cover for a real attack.
abstract: Newly declassified United States government report details episode in which 1983 NATO training exercise was mistakenly identified by Soviet Union as legitimate threat, nearly prompting full-scale nuclear response; event serves as basis of retro television Deutschland 83.
lead_paragraph: A newly declassified document says that Soviet military leaders may have thought that the Able Archer training exercise was a cover for a real attack.

headline.main: NATO War Games Unwittingly Put Soviets and U.S. on ‘Hair Trigger’ in ’83, Analysis Suggests
